title: SoTL Glossary
text:
Overview
The glossary outlines a crowd-sourced collection of terms used in the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL).

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

title: I
text:
Impact
The demonstable contribution of research.
The demonstrable contribution that excellent research makes to society and the economy.

title: S
text:
SoTL
A scholarly approach to teaching.
SoTL, or the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning, is a scholarly approach to teaching that involves systematically examining one’s own teaching practices and student learning to improve both, often with the goal of making findings public to contribute to the wider teaching community
